Landing Page Launched  

Thursday, October 29, 2015
We are proud to announce the launch of FRED2’s own landing page. We will keep you updated on new developments and upcoming releases. If you want to get involved int developing FRED2 further, or have some questions and comments, feel free to contact us (schubert@informatik.uni-tuebingen.de) or open up an issue...
